languages.text: "Я виню себя, что проморгал предательство изменницы Ирлиэт. Но рад, что она недолго торжествовала над нами. Фон Валанциусы не прощают измен".
"I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."
languages.original_text: "Я виню себя, что проморгал предательство изменницы Ирлиэт. Но рад, что она недолго торжествовала над нами. Фон Валанциусы не прощают измен".

traits.locale_text: "I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."
"I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."
"I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."
"I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."

languages.text: “我很懊恼，我竟然没有留意到伊莉耶特那个叛徒的背信弃义之举，但我很高兴，她很快就得到了应有的下场。冯·瓦兰修斯家族绝不会容忍背叛。”
languages.original_text: "I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."

traits.locale_text: “我很懊恼，我竟然没有留意到伊莉耶特那个叛徒的背信弃义之举，但我很高兴，她很快就得到了应有的下场。冯·瓦兰修斯家族绝不会容忍背叛。”

languages.text: « Je m'en veux de ne pas avoir su voir la perfidie de cette traîtresse d'Yrliet. Heureusement, sa victoire n'aura été que de courte durée. La maison von Valancius ne pardonne pas la trahison. »
languages.original_text: "I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'en veux de ne pas avoir su voir la perfidie de cette traîtresse d'Yrliet. Heureusement, sa victoire n'aura été que de courte durée. La maison von Valancius ne pardonne pas la trahison. »

languages.text: «Me culpo a mí mismo por no haberme percatado de la perfidia de la traidora Yrliet, pero me alegra saber que su victoria sobre nosotros ha sido breve. La casa von Valancius no perdona la traición».
languages.original_text: "I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."

traits.locale_text: «Me culpo a mí mismo por no haberme percatado de la perfidia de la traidora Yrliet, pero me alegra saber que su victoria sobre nosotros ha sido breve. La casa von Valancius no perdona la traición».

languages.text: 「反逆者ユリエットの裏切りに気付けなかった責任を感じています。しかし彼女の勝利が長くは続かなかった点は喜ばしい。フォン・ヴァランシウス家が反逆を許すことはないのです」
languages.original_text: "I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."

traits.locale_text: 「反逆者ユリエットの裏切りに気付けなかった責任を感じています。しかし彼女の勝利が長くは続かなかった点は喜ばしい。フォン・ヴァランシウス家が反逆を許すことはないのです」

languages.text: "Ich gebe mir selbst die Schuld. Ich habe die Heimtücke dieser Verräterin Yrliet nicht bemerkt. Doch ich bin dankbar, dass ihr Sieg über uns nur von kurzer Dauer war. Das Haus Valancius vergibt keinen Hochverrat."
languages.original_text: "I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe mir selbst die Schuld. Ich habe die Heimtücke dieser Verräterin Yrliet nicht bemerkt. Doch ich bin dankbar, dass ihr Sieg über uns nur von kurzer Dauer war. Das Haus Valancius vergibt keinen Hochverrat."

languages.original_text: "I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."

languages.text: "O hain Yrliet'in kalleşliğini fark edemediğim için kendimi suçluyorum. Kazandığı zafer kısa süreli olduğu için memnunum. Von Valancius Hanesi, ihaneti affetmez."
languages.original_text: "I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."

traits.locale_text: "O hain Yrliet'in kalleşliğini fark edemediğim için kendimi suçluyorum. Fakat bize karşı kazandığı zafer kısa süreli olduğu için memnunum. Von Valancius Hanesi, ihaneti affetmez."
